{{Location Intro|The '''Akademiya'''|description=<p>It is [[Sumeru Akademiya]]'s main building, built upon the [[Divine Tree]]. The [[House of Daena]], the Akademiya's library, is located at the heart of the building.</p>}}

The doors to the Akademiya will automatically open upon approaching the building.

==Features==
===Interactables===
*[[Luxurious Chest]] containing 185,000 [[Mora]]. Interacting it will also prompt dialogue from [[Paimon]]:
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Paimon:''' Whoa! Here's another treasure chest! Let's open it! There's a note in it, too...
:'''Paimon:''' "...I should stop procrastinating. I will finish the thesis proposal tomorrow!"
:'''Paimon:''' "I'll just put 5,000 Mora in this chest every time I waste another day. I won't retrieve the Mora until my thesis proposal is approved!"
:'''Paimon:''' Haha, let's see how much Mora this chest contains, shall we?
{{Dialogue end}}
